response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $1,000,000 to you. However, considering the market conditions and the investment we've made into developing this product, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
